Text.Page:
We need to hit the gulas' slave operation where it hurtsâ€”right in the coinpurse.

No, that's not a euphemism. I'm talking about actual coinpurses.

The {@LinkCreature:8#2051#devan acolytes} run a lot of the business at the slave markets. See if you can make them take their coinpurses elsewhere. Greed is the worst!
Those devas were no better than the gulas. You did well.
